TopicTitle: Is it possible to disable certain MechJeb 2 features?

Articles.Content: I've been using mechjeb 2 for some time now and there are some features that I never use and don't think I'll ever use (like ascent guidance, rover autopilot, etc.). I just don't want them to appear when I open the mechjeb menu. Is there a way to remove them?

Pretty sure...yes
Somehwere in the UI, there should be a button to get to where you can setup the UI layout. Somehwere in there, you can customize an MJ dropdown menu, to add/remove different "modules" of MJ. I dont believe it "enables/disables" anything... It just allows you to customive what shows up in the menu.

You can also customize the size and position of where you want it on screen. IIRC, you can even "snap it" to the any edge of the screen, and where-ever you want it.
